title: Noam Chomsky - 1990-09-11 - Interview on Iraq-Kuwait Crisis - The MacNeil/Lehrer News Hour
description:
Be sure to pick 720p for best sound quality.
On September 11, 1990, Noam Chomsky made his one and only appearance on the MacNeil/Lehrer News Hour, which was broadcast nightly on American Public Broadcasting. 



As I learned recently, soon after the media watchdog group, FAIR, published a study of guests on news programs, like MacNeil/Lehrer - in which they exposed them as having a recurring group of "experts" on air on a regular basis - they apparently caved to the public outraged and finally allowed Noam Chomsky on.  

De-noised to sound better than the original broadcast.
